about_the_game:
A Home Below is a 3D underwater adventure game where you play as a hermit crab exploring the ruins of a house that’s been lost to the sea. 

Immerse yourself in a new ecosystem

Interact with other sea life. Make friends, evade predators, find food, and observe relationships to solve puzzles and venture deeper into the house. 

Explore & Seek shells

Journey from room to room in search of the perfect shell. Use the man-made objects you find along the way and their unique properties to survive and continue your search. 

Discover the story

Find objects left behind by the humans that once lived in the house, telling the story of what happened to them.

Key Features: 

  • For fans of Journey, Stray, Gone Home, and Abzû.

  • A non-combative, atmospheric experience of beauty and discovery. Explore an underwater house full of secrets and sea life.

  • A short game of light puzzle solving and platforming, with a story told through encounters and objects.

  • Discover a diverse ecosystem, with gameplay based on real species and behaviours, adding encounters to your bestiary.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: In the ruins of a house that’s been lost to the sea, a hermit crab goes in search of shells. Explore the secrets of each room in this third-person underwater adventure.
